title: So i did a thing... heh. I didn't even think it was possible.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
So, anyone mind explaining this? like fuck, i thought getting gold 5 from 10w 0l from placements was the max without duo.... i have not duo'd any one of these games at all, was purely going soloQ. i was ready online as i was near the end of the provisional that anything above gold 5 had to be duo'd and 10:0. we'll i guess i've proven that wrong. 

TL:DR - gold 4 from 8:2 in placement without duo. explain?

replies.body: it depends on who you're matched with and if you're duoing, i've gone 9/1 and hit Gold 1 out of placements on a fresh unranked before. In my promo's to plat on said account i got matched with someone in there promo's to master tier luckily they were on my team :)

Plat 5 is the highest and Duoing or going in a Premade has no effect on your overall MMR. You'll get around the same elo as you did in the last season no matter what, so if you were Gold 5 last season you'll get SIlver 2, 1 and Gold 4 depending on your wins and losses
I'd be happy to win 1 out of 10 ranked games, so you've done well xD
I just went 9-1 on a second account and got gold 2, so it all depends on who you play against.

I remember Arcsecond going 10-0 on a fresh account and ending up in Platinum V, so that's certainly possible. You probably just won the right games against the right opponents (you were facing Gold 1-4's and Plats during your last provisionals, so there's that).

I was under the impression that 10:0 was enough to get you anywhere up to platinum, but for all you know the teams you faced off against were of a very high tier so you got more credit for winning. It's certainly questionable especially because 10 games can choose where you go and climbing takes FOREVER, which is really bad if you get unlucky during placements or are new to ranked and have no clue.
